Trigger You critically succeed on a save against a fear effect whose source was a creature, or a creature fails or critically fails an Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Demoralize] you.

You laugh at your enemy's failed attempts to bully you, turning the tables on your foe with a display of terrifying bravado. You attempt an Intimidation check to Demoralize the triggering creature.
